mapper.update: UPDATE Member SET UserLevel=#{UserLevel} WHERE UserId=#{UserId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM Member ) A, ( SELECT @NO := 0 ) B ) C WHERE C.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Member WHERE DATE(joinDate) between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
SELECT id from Member WHERE id=#{id}
